pinyin: zui4 weng1 zhi1 yi4 bu4 zai4 jiu3

definitions.zui4 weng1 zhi1 yi4 bu4 zai4 jiu3: wine-lover's heart is not in the cup (idiom); a drinker not really interested in alcohol; having an ulterior motive; to have other things in mind; with an ax to grind; accomplishing something besides what one set out to do;
